item.title: Repowering a Snapper Comet
item.description: I inherited a 27" Snapper Comet riding mower from a neighbor after it’s engine blew. Turns out, the owner had failed to change and ensure adequate engine oil, so it seised. I happily accepted the donation, initially attempted to rebuild the Honda engine, but eventually replaced it with a new engine. It ran well for a few years. Here’s the story. A Gift Snapper A neighbor living a block away was the original owner.
